marytts.signalproc.analysis
Class RegularizedPostWarpedCepstrumEstimator

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.analysis.RegularizedCepstrumEstimator
      marytts.signalproc.analysis.RegularizedPostWarpedCepstrumEstimator

public class RegularizedPostWarpedCepstrumEstimator
extends RegularizedCepstrumEstimator

Implements a cepstral envelope estimation algorithm for fitting an envelope to discrete frequency amplitudes. Reference: W. D'haes, X. Rodet: Discrete Cepstrum Coefficients as Perceptual Features, International Computer Music Conference (ICMC), Singapore, 2003.

Author:
oytun.turk
